I would think that is the only way to stop a "hung" thread. The thread can't
stop itself if it's hung... paradox...

I vaguely remember a lesson in one of my computing lessons that a computing
system would not able to tell the difference if a thread is running or hung,
becuz from the outside, the "black box" it looks the same.
